cooperation.transfer.mode.name: Transfer mode
cooperation.transfer.mode.description[zh_CN]: 用于配置文件投送传输模式，选项包含0（同一局域网下的所有人），1（仅允许正在协同的人），2（不允许）
cooperation.transfer.mode.description: It's used to configure the file transfer mode. Options include 0 (Everyone in the same LAN), 1 (Only those who are collaborating are allowed), and 2 (Not allow).

cooperation.discovery.mode.name: Discovery mode
cooperation.discovery.mode.description[zh_CN]: 用于配置设备发现模式，选项包含0（同一局域网下的所有人），1（不允许）
cooperation.discovery.mode.description: It's used to configure the device discovery mode. Options include 0 (Everyone in the same LAN), and 1 (Not allow).
